alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:05PM MST until January 11 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. A few wind prone locations could see sustained winds near 40 mph with gusts above 55 mph. * WHERE...Chiricahua Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument
